decks.notes: This aggressive Orzhov deck relies on a combination of removal spells and powerful creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The deck includes a mix of efficient removal like Go for the Throat and Cut Down, as well as powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Gix, Yawgmoth Praetor. By controlling the board with removal and threats, the deck can quickly end the game before the opponent has a chance to recover. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistent access to both black and white mana sources.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful combat tricks. By utilizing low cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Emberheart Challenger, combined with pump spells like Might of the Meek and Monstrous Rage, the deck aims to deal fast and efficient damage to the opponent's life total. Cards like Shock and Royal Treatment help to control the board and clear a path for the aggressive creatures to attack. The deck is designed to capitalize on its speed and efficiency to win the game before the opponent can stabilize.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on a combination of powerful creatures and removal spells to control the board and apply pressure to the opponent. The deck utilizes cards like Mosswood Dreadknight, Glissa Sunslayer, and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to quickly establish a threatening board presence while using removal spells such as Go for the Throat and Cut Down to deal with opposing threats. The deck also includes versatile cards like Hostile Investigator and Gix's Command to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and targeted removal.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and spell cards to quickly deal damage and control the battlefield. By utilizing cards that provide additional creatures, pump up existing creatures, or offer disruption, the deck aims to maintain board control and pressure the opponent. The mana base is designed to support a fast-paced playstyle, enabling the deck to consistently play its threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck is built to be proactive and assert dominance in the early stages of the game.

The main concept of this Orzhov Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By using cards like Braids, Arisen Nightmare and Spiteful Hexmage to apply pressure, along with removal spells like Legions to Ashes and Malicious Eclipse to control the board, you aim to outpace your opponent and secure victory. Additionally, cards like The Witch's Vanity and Tithing Blade provide additional support and utility to further your game plan. With a mix of creatures, spells, and lands, this deck aims to be fast, efficient, and ruthless in securing wins.

The main focus of this deck is to establish control over the game by using a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy and prevent them from executing their win conditions by controlling the board and hand. It utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Jace and Teferi, alongside efficient removal spells like Get Lost and Temporary Lockdown. Additionally, the deck includes card advantage options like Deduce and Sunfall to ensure a steady stream of resources. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to dominate the game through control and manipulation.

The Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on aggressive strategies, utilizing cards like Legions to Ashes and Shoot the Sheriff to quickly eliminate threats. Season of the Burrow and Virtue of Loyalty help to boost creature power and maintain board presence. Liliana of the Veil provides additional control options. The deck includes a mix of removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down, as well as powerful creatures like Preacher of the Schism and Caustic Bronco. Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal and Beza, the Bounding Spring offer additional aggression and disruption. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with fast, efficient threats.

The main focus of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a relentless stream of aggressive creatures and burn spells. Using low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Callous Sell-Sword, along with powerful pump spells like Monstrous Rage and Felonious Rage, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. With the addition of efficient removal spells like Dreadmaw's Ire and Blazing Crescendo, the deck is designed to maintain pressure on the opponent and close out games before they have a chance to stabilize.

The main concept of this Aggro - Orzhov Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm opponents with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing cards like Novice Inspector and Nurturing Pixie to establish an early board presence, and then following up with powerful creatures like Rottenmouth Viper and Braids, Arisen Nightmare, the deck aims to apply consistent pressure and disrupt opponent's game plan. The deck also includes removal spells like Malicious Eclipse and Legions to Ashes to deal with threats and maintain control of the battlefield.
